other_tests.findings: Ictal recording showed right focal to bilateral clonic seizures with hemifacial clonic movements spreading to the superior and inferior right limbs, ending with an opisthotonic posture. Interictal v-EEG revealed normal background activity with rare spike and wave discharges in the left frontocentral brain regions.
Prolonged QT interval secondary to hypocalcemia.
Identified a de novo heterozygous CASR gene mutation with a c.3747 > C p (Leu125Pro) variant.
